programme.desc: A children's author hosts one last Christmas dinner before selling the family home but finds a way to save the home when reuniting with a former ex.

programme.title: Christmas Tail
programme.desc: A heartwarming tale of friendship and love as single mom Maggie adopts a Labrador for her son Ethan.

programme.title: Holiday Baggage
programme.desc: A single mother invites her ex over for Christmas on one condition: he must reconcile with their daughters.

programme.title: Home For The Holidays
programme.desc: A loving aunt struggles to adopt her young relatives after their parents die in a car accident.

programme.title: Christmas in the City
programme.desc: Wendy and her daughter head to the city to make enough money to save her father's candy store from closing.

programme.title: The Wedding Rule
programme.desc: Gemma and Max, former childhood friends are bequeathed a restaurant but must pretend to be married.

programme.title: New Dogs, Old Tricks
programme.desc: Jay's hazing ends abruptly after a Gamma Pi visit. Liz lies to cover for Mindy, causing big issues for others.

programme.title: New Dogs, Old Tricks
programme.desc: Sarah searches for her missing roommate. Jay endures Petes revenge as Kappa Psi sisters prep for Gamma Fair.

programme.title: Best Friend From Heaven
programme.desc: When her dog is killed, Tara cancels her wedding. But her dog's ghost and her small town have a surprise.

programme.title: Falling for the Manny
programme.desc: Alice is up for partner at her firm and hires her sisters manny, Jacob, to help with her daughter.

programme.title: The Soulmate Search
programme.desc: Lindsay and Will bond after agreeing the dating service that matched them has made a mistake.

programme.title: A Royal Recipe for Love
programme.desc: When Emma is hired to bake for a royal cake, she finds herself at odds with a Prince.

programme.title: Dance Together
programme.desc: An injured dancer and a shy Deaf girl overcome bullies, disability stigma, and other high school obstacles.

programme.title: Buried Secrets
programme.desc: A cop-turned-writer creates suspicion when she publishes her first novel.

programme.title: The Wedding Chapel
programme.desc: Uninspired and newly single, painter Sara is down on her luck and wants nothing more than to get away.

programme.title: Runaway Christmas Bride
programme.desc: KATE PAULSON is standing at the altar, ready to say, 'I do' to the man of her dreams, ALEX. Just as they are about to exchange vows, Alex reveals a devastating family secret.

programme.title: A Firehouse Christmas (aka A Christmas Hero)
programme.desc: Firefighter Jenny has fallen in love with Tom. However his ex-wife Mary demands a reconciliation if he wants to see his daughter at Christmas.

programme.title: 12 Dares of Christmas
programme.desc: Teacher Elara takes part in a 12 Dares of Christmas challenge with French teacher Gabriel.

programme.title: A Christmas Truce
programme.desc: An American soldier and a Belgian woman fall in love during a brief holiday truce amid the Battle of the Bulge.

programme.title: Operation Christmas List
programme.desc: 12-year-old Barney has a plan to beat the Christmas rush and buy the entire stock of the most sought after gift, Crabby Mousie doll, the night before they go on sale.

programme.title: From Italy with Amore
programme.desc: In the quest to find her dream man, Ariel meets Daniel who shows that food is the way to her heart.

programme.title: At Home With Tori

programme.title: New Dogs, Old Tricks
programme.desc: Liz and Kappa Psi Psi prep for Gamma Fair and T-shirt sales. Alans class inspires Annas look change.

programme.title: Food for the Heart
programme.desc: After taking on too much with her meal delivery service, Lia accepts her neighbor Elis help.

programme.title: Vote One For Love
programme.desc: Candace is unexpectedly tasked with helping her former high school rival win a mayoral race.

programme.title: A Match for the Prince
programme.desc: A matchmaker risks falling for a real-life prince before his royal wedding date.

programme.title: Cowboy & Indiana

programme.title: Best Friend From Heaven

programme.title: Marley \u0026 Me
programme.desc: A newlywed couple's life transforms after adopting Marley, a mischievous dog whose antics bring joy. Subsequently, as they navigate parenthood with their baby's arrival, Marley completes their family.

credits.actor: Owen Wilson,Jennifer Aniston,Eric Dane,Kathleen Turner,Alan Arkin,Nathan Gamble,Haley Bennett,Ann Dowd,Clarke Peters,Finley Jacobsen,Lucy Merriam,Bryce Robinson,Ben Hyland,Tom Irwin,Alec Mapa,Sandra Martin,Joyce Van Patten

programme.title: The Starving Games
programme.desc: In a deadly game orchestrated by President Snowballs, skilled archer Kantmiss Evershot, her boyfriend Dale and tech-savvy ally Peter Malarkey must rely on their wits and skills to survive.

credits.actor: Brant Daugherty,Maiara Walsh,Cody Christian,Lauren Bowles,Alexandria Deberry,Nick Gomez,Theodus Crane,Trenton Rostedt,Eric Buarque,Joseph Aviel

programme.title: The Way, Way Back
programme.desc: Duncan, a shy teenager, visits a beach house owned by his mother's boyfriend. Annoyed with everyone, he wanders away to a local water park and meets Owen, who helps him open up to the world.

credits.actor: Steve Carell,Toni Collette,Allison Janney,AnnaSophia Robb,Sam Rockwell,Maya Rudolph,Liam James,Rob Corddry,Amanda Peet,River Alexander,Zoe Levin,Nat Faxon,Jim Rash,Adam Riegler,Jeffery Ryan

programme.title: Land Of The Bears
programme.desc: Set in the wilderness of the Kamchatka Peninsula, the land of legends and the kingdom of wild brown bears, we follow the daily adventures of five wild brown bears.

programme.title: Angels & Demons
programme.desc: Harvard symbologist Robert Langdon is recruited by the Vatican to investigate the apparent return of the Illuminati - a secret, underground organization - after four cardinals are kidnapped on the night of the papal conclave.

programme.title: The Runner
programme.desc: In the aftermath of the BP oil spill, an idealistic but imperfect New Orleans politician (Nicolas Cage) finds his plans of restoration unraveling as his own life becomes contaminated with corruption, scandal and deceit.

programme.title: Moneyball
programme.desc: The story of Oakland Athletics general manager Billy Beane's successful attempt to put together a baseball team on a budget, by employing computer-generated analysis to draft his players.

programme.title: The Family Fang
programme.desc: A brother and sister return to their family home in search of their world famous parents who have disappeared.

programme.title: Texas Killing Fields
programme.desc: In the Texas bayous, a local homicide detective teams up with a cop from New York City to investigate a series of unsolved murders.

programme.title: Knives Out
programme.desc: When renowned crime novelist Harlan Thrombey is found dead at his estate just after his 85th birthday, the inquisitive and debonair Detective Benoit Blanc is mysteriously enlisted to investigate. From Harlan's dysfunctional family to his devoted staff, Blanc sifts through a web of red herrings and self-serving lies to uncover the truth behind Harlan's untimely death.

programme.title: The November Man
programme.desc: An ex- CIA operative is brought back in on a very personal mission and finds himself pitted against his former pupil in a deadly game involving high level CIA officials and the Russian president-elect.

programme.title: Lost River
programme.desc: Billy, a single mother of two, is led into a macabre underworld while her teenage son, Bones, discovers a secret road leading to an underwater town. Both Billy and Bones must dive deep into the mystery if their family is to survive.

programme.title: Django Unchained
programme.desc: With the help of a German bounty hunter, a freed slave sets out to rescue his wife from a brutal Mississippi plantation owner.

programme.title: Fallen
programme.desc: Lucinda Price is sent to a reform academy under the assumption that she has killed a boy. There, she meets two mysterious boys, Cam and Daniel, to whom she feels drawn to both. But as the love triangle unfurls, it is Daniel that Luce cannot keep herself away from, and things begin to take a darker turn when she finds out his true identity.

programme.title: DSC
programme.desc: Talented directors provide an entertaining insight into the most intriguing stories and anecdotes concerning some of their best works.

programme.title: Land Of The Bears
programme.desc: Set in the wilderness of the Kamchatka Peninsula, the land of legends and the kingdom of wild brown bears, we follow the daily adventures of five wild brown bears.

programme.title: Speed Kills
programme.desc: Speedboat racing champion and multimillionaire Ben Aronoff leads a double life that lands him in trouble with the law and drug lords.

programme.title: Wild For The Night
programme.desc: A loner fresh out of rehab and hunted by both sides of the law returns home to solve the murder of his sister, and finds himself entangled in a game of revenge on the LA club circuit.

programme.title: Jennifer Lopez: Dance Again
programme.desc: A documentary that chronicles Jennifer Lopez's life on and off-stage during her first ever world tour. (2011), she was more intent on touring than ever. However, it was not until March 2012 when the tour came into the works. As rumors began to circulate, Lopez later confirmed that April that she would be embar.

programme.desc: Los Angeles, 1969. TV star Rick Dalton, a struggling actor specializing in westerns, and stuntman Cliff Booth, his best friend, try to survive in a constantly changing movie industry. Dalton is the neighbor of the young and promising actress and model Sharon Tate, who has just married the prestigious Polish director Roman Polanski.

programme.title: Lady Bloodfight
programme.desc: Jane is a beautiful but troubled American girl backpacking through Japan, when her raw street fighting skills draw the attention of Oshima, Japanese karate champion, who recruits and trains her to fight in the vicious, all-female, underground martial arts tournament known as "The Kumite". After months of rigorous preparation, Jane is ready to face off against the deadliest female fighters in the world, including Ling, the Chinese apprentice of Oshima's nemesis. But other nefarious forces lie in.

programme.title: Hansel & Gretel: Witch Hunters
programme.desc: After getting a taste for blood as children, Hansel and Gretel have become the ultimate vigilantes, hell-bent on retribution. Now, unbeknownst to them, Hansel and Gretel have become the hunted, and must face an evil far greater than witches... their past.

programme.title: The Terminator
programme.desc: In the post-apocalyptic future, reigning tyrannical supercomputers teleport a cyborg assassin known as the "Terminator" back to 1984 to kill Sarah Connor, whose unborn son is destined to lead insurgen.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible -- Ghost Protocol
programme.desc: Ethan Hunt and his team are racing against time to track down a dangerous terrorist named Hendricks, who has gained access to Russian nuclear launch codes and is planning a strike on the United States. An attempt to stop him ends in an explosion causing severe destruction to the Kremlin and the IMF to be implicated in the bombing, forcing the President to disavow them. No longer being aided by the government, Ethan and his team chase Hendricks around the globe, although they might still be too l.

programme.title: Transformers: Age of Extinction
programme.desc: As humanity picks up the pieces, following the conclusion of "Transformers: Dark of the Moon," Autobots and Decepticons have all but vanished from the face of the planet. However, a group of powerful, ingenious businessman and scientists attempt to learn from past Transformer incursions and push the boundaries of technology beyond what they can control - all while an ancient, powerful Transformer menace sets Earth in his cross-hairs.

programme.title: The Darkest Hour
programme.desc: In Moscow, five young people lead the charge against an alien race which has attacked Earth via our power supply.

programme.title: Die Another Day
programme.desc: Bond takes on a North Korean leader who undergoes DNA replacement procedures that allow him to assume different identities. American agent, Jinx Johnson assists Bond in his attempt to thwart the villain's plans to exploit a satellite that is powered by solar energy.

Now, as the police attempt to silence the woman before she can testify about the city's rampant corruption, the ex-con who just regained his freedom must defend her life, and clear his own name.

But first, he must complete one last mission - even if it means juggling the two toughest assignments yet: hunting down the world's most ruthless terrorist and looking after his teenage daughter for the first time in ten years, while his wife is out of town.
